select

select count(1) from waybill where enabled = 1 and order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and waybill_status = '待派单'
select id from waybill where order_id = #{orderId, jdbcType=INTEGER} and enabled = 1 ORDER BY id

select
from waybill where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and enabled = 1 and waybill_status not in ('待派单')

select
from waybill where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and enabled = 1 and waybill_status in ('待接单','待出发','待出发','前往装货地','待装货','待送达',"待签收","已完成")

select
FROM waybill WHERE enabled = 1 AND waybill_status = '待接单' AND send_time IS NOT NULL
and send_time < DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 24 HOUR) and create_time > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 DAY)

SELECT w.* FROM waybill w LEFT JOIN waybill_items t ON w.id = t.waybill_id WHERE w.enabled = 1
AND w.waybill_status in ('待出发','前往装货地','待装货','待送达','待签收')
AND w.waybill_status = "已完成"
AND w.waybill_status = "已取消"
AND w.load_site_id = #{userId}
AND t.unload_site_id = #{userId}
GROUP BY w.id
,t.required_time
ORDER BY w.load_time DESC
ORDER BY t.required_time DESC
select count(1) from waybill where driver_id = #{driverId} and waybill_status in ('待出发','前往装货地','待装货','待送达','待签收')

select
from waybill where
waybill_status=#{waybillStatus} and send_time< DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 60 MINUTE)

SELECT
FROM waybill WHERE enabled = 1 AND waybill_status = '待出发' AND load_time <= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) AND load_time > NOW();

SELECT w.* FROM waybill w INNER JOIN waybill_tracking wt ON w.id = wt.waybill_id WHERE w.enabled = 1 AND w.waybill_status = '前往装货地' AND wt.enabled = 1 AND wt.new_status = '待装货' AND wt.create_time > w.load_time UNION SELECT w.* FROM waybill w LEFT JOIN waybill_tracking wt ON w.id = wt.waybill_id AND wt.enabled = 1 AND wt.new_status = '待装货' WHERE w.enabled = 1 AND w.waybill_status = '前往装货地' AND w.load_time < NOW() AND wt.id is NULL

SELECT w.* FROM waybill w INNER JOIN waybill_tracking wt ON w.id = wt.waybill_id INNER JOIN waybill_items wai ON w.id = wai.waybill_id WHERE w.enabled = 1 AND w.waybill_status = '待送达' AND wt.enabled = 1 AND wt.new_status = '待签收' AND wt.create_time > wai.required_time UNION SELECT w.* FROM waybill w INNER JOIN waybill_items wai on w.id = wai.waybill_id LEFT JOIN waybill_tracking wt ON w.id = wt.waybill_id AND wt.enabled = 1 AND wt.new_status = '待签收' WHERE w.enabled = 1 AND w.waybill_status = '待送达' AND wai.required_time < NOW() AND wt.id is NULL
